mapper.insert: INSERT INTO local_specialty (city_id, name, type, image_url, description, seasonal_month, farmer_contact) VALUES (#{cityId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{imageUrl}, #{description}, #{seasonalMonth}, #{farmerContact})
mapper.update: UPDATE local_specialty SET city_id = #{cityId}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, description = #{description}, seasonal_month = #{seasonalMonth}, farmer_contact = #{farmerContact} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM local_specialty WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY create_time DESC
